home.subtitleDescription: From now on you will never forget anything and your life will be easier. Add, edit and delete items you need to buy with just one click.

theVirtualShoppingList.subtitle: The VIRTUAL shopping list
theVirtualShoppingList.description: With this application you can make convenient and easy shopping lists. You can modify them at any time adding, editing and removing items.

shareYourLists.subtitle: Share lists with your friends!
shareYourLists.description: Do you have to organize a party and you have to make a list of what to buy? Make it using our app! You will have your list ready and easy to share with whoever you want in seconds!

remindWhatToBuy.subtitle: It reminds you when to shop!
remindWhatToBuy.description: You won't have anymore the problem of remembering when to shop because our wonderful app will notify you whenever you are near a supermarket!

home.buildYouTooYourListPhrase: Build you too your shopping list

login.goToRegisterLink: Not registered yet? Create a new account

emailSent.title: Almost done!
emailSent.description: We've just sent an email with the activation link. Click it to enable your account!

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.content:
Last updated: November 2018
Websites linking to this page have chosen to adopt this generic privacy policy as their own. This means that they agree to abide by the principles laid out below.
Information that is gathered from visitors

In common with other websites, log files are stored on the web server saving details such as the visitor's IP address, browser type, referring page and time of visit.

Cookies may be used to remember visitor preferences when interacting with the website.

Where registration is required, the visitor's email and a username will be stored on the server.

How the Information is used

The information is used to enhance the vistor's experience when using the website to display personalised content and possibly advertising.

E-mail addresses will not be sold, rented or leased to 3rd parties.

E-mail may be sent to inform you of news of our services or offers by us or our affiliates.

Visitor Options

If you have subscribed to one of our services, you may unsubscribe by following the instructions which are included in e-mail that you receive.

You may be able to block cookies via your browser settings but this may prevent you from access to certain features of the website.

Cookies

Cookies are small digital signature files that are stored by your web browser that allow your preferences to be recorded when visiting the website. Also they may be used to track your return visits to the website.

3rd party advertising companies may also use cookies for tracking purposes.

newProduct.title: Create product
newProduct.note: You are creating a new custom product. If this list is shared or will be shared in the future, all collaborators will be able to see this product. However, only you will be able to add it to other lists outside of this.
